name: Scrape Yelp Business Data with Gemini AI, Bright Data & Google Sheets

user.name: Bright Data
user.bio: Bright Data is the leading web data infrastructure powering AI and BI, trusted by over 20,000 companies - from top AI innovators to global leaders in eCommerce, financial services, market research, cybersecurity, travel, martech, and beyond.

description:
# üîç Yelp Business Finder: Scraping Local Businesses by Keyword, Category & Location Using Bright Data and Google Sheets

**Description:** Automate local business data collection from Yelp using AI-powered input validation, Bright Data scraping, and automatic Google Sheets integration. Perfect for market research, lead generation, and competitive analysis.

## üõ†Ô∏è How It Works

1. **Form Submission:** Users submit a simple form with country, location, and business category parameters.

2. **AI Validation:** Google Gemini AI validates and cleans input data, ensuring proper formatting and Yelp category alignment.

3. **Data Scraping:** Bright Data's Yelp dataset API scrapes business information based on the cleaned parameters.

4. **Status Monitoring:** The workflow monitors scraping progress and waits for data completion.

5. **Data Export:** Final business data is automatically appended to your Google Sheets for easy analysis.

## üìã Setup Steps

**‚è±Ô∏è Estimated Setup Time:** 10-15 minutes

### Prerequisites

‚úÖ Active n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)
‚úÖ Google account with Sheets access
‚úÖ Bright Data account with Yelp scraping dataset
‚úÖ Google Gemini API access

### Configuration Steps

1. **Import Workflow:**
   - Copy the provided JSON workflow
   - In n8n: Go to Workflows ‚Üí + Add workflow ‚Üí Import from JSON
   - Paste the JSON and click Import

2. **Configure Google Sheets:**
   - Create a new Google Sheet or use an existing one
   - Set up OAuth2 credentials in n8n
   - Update the Google Sheets node with your document ID
   - Configure column mappings for business data

3. **Setup Bright Data:**
   - Add your Bright Data API credentials to n8n
   - Replace `BRIGHT_DATA_API_KEY` with your actual API key
   - Verify your Yelp dataset ID in the HTTP request nodes
   - Test the connection

4. **Configure Google Gemini:**
   - Add your Google Gemini API credentials
   - Test the AI Agent connection
   - Verify the model configuration

5. **Test & Activate:**
   - Activate the workflow using the toggle switch
   - Test with sample data: country="US", location="New York", category="restaurants"
   - Verify data appears correctly in your Google Sheet

## üìä Data Output

**üìç Business Name**  
Official business name from Yelp

**‚≠ê Overall Rating**  
Average customer rating (1-5 stars)

**üìù Reviews Count**  
Total number of customer reviews

**üè∑Ô∏è Categories**  
Business categories and tags

**üåê Website URL**  
Official business website

**üìû Phone Number**  
Contact phone number

**üìç Address**  
Full business address

**üîó Yelp URL**  
Direct link to Yelp listing

## üéØ Use Cases

**üîç Market Research**  
Analyze local business landscapes and competition

**üìà Lead Generation**  
Build prospect lists for B2B outreach

**üè™ Location Analysis**  
Research business density by area and category

**üìä Competitive Intelligence**  
Monitor competitor ratings and customer feedback

**‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes:**
- Ensure you comply with Yelp's terms of service and rate limits
- Bright Data usage may incur costs based on your plan
- AI validation helps improve data quality and reduce errors
- Monitor your Google Sheets for data accuracy

## üîß Troubleshooting

**Common Issues:**
- **API Rate Limits:** Implement delays between requests if needed
- **Invalid Categories:** AI agent helps standardize category names
- **Empty Results:** Verify location spelling and category alignment
- **Authentication Errors:** Check all API credentials and permissions

**üöÄ Ready to start scraping Yelp business data efficiently!**

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

workflow.name: Yelp Business Finder: Scraping Local Businesses by Keyword, Category & Location Using Bright Data and Google Sheets

nodes.name: Check Delivery Status of Snapshot ID

parameters.content:
üü¢ 1. On Form Submission
Triggers the workflow when the user submits a form with country, location, and category values for Yelp business scraping.

ü§ñ 2. AI Agent - Validate Input
Uses Google Gemini AI to validate and clean the user's inputs (country, location, category) for proper formatting and relevance to Yelp categories.

üîµ 3. Google Gemini Chat Model
Provides AI capabilities to transform raw form inputs into clean, structured JSON optimized for Bright Data's search filters.

üîß 4. Format AI Response for Scraper
Parses the cleaned JSON returned by the AI and ensures it's properly formatted for Bright Data API consumption.

üåê 5. Yelp Data Scraper - Bright Data
Sends the cleaned JSON input to Bright Data's Yelp dataset using the search_filters trigger to extract business information.

‚è± 6. Check Delivery Status of Snapshot ID
Monitors the progress of the Bright Data scraping task using the snapshot_id returned from the previous step.

‚è∞ 7. Wait 1 Minute
Waits for 1 minute before rechecking Bright Data status to allow sufficient time for the data scraping to complete.

üîÑ 8. Check Final Status
Conditionally checks if the status from Bright Data is "ready". If not ready, loops back to wait again until data is available.

üì• 9. Fetch Snapshot Results
When Bright Data status is "ready", this step fetches the complete dataset snapshot containing all scraped Yelp business data.

üìä 10. Google Sheets - Save Business Data
Appends the final Yelp business data (name, rating, reviews, phone, website, address, etc.) into your designated Google Sheet.

main.node: Check Delivery Status of Snapshot ID
Check Delivery Status of Snapshot ID
